topic.title: Censored Search.bit
topic.body:
Search for delisted clearweb censored websites.
http://127.0.0.1:43110/CensoredSearch.bit

1_1Ad65ppm6jjuP1rzFTQZRGzBHVGWk8EcyA.body: Awesome! been waiting a long time for something like this!

Absolutely love the live results, that it displays a catalog as you type.
Because I can't spell for shit.

I think it would be a good idea to add a "Request" link
maybe when bitmessage support comes out.
Why isn't Idiocracy(2006) on PLAY? it's available on RARBG

For those looking for Games, TV Shows, check out
http://127.0.0.1:43110/ZeroTorrent.bit/

2_1MCsyW6W243LY69ZYm99XbV3M8Gbbrp5hF.body: I like the idea, and why not, it's just another working example.

1_1BgmUwuLD8DU6ffpaKSCGjZDDddEoivdLY.body: Can we get some way to make 'Request' link so users can requests movies that may be missing from the catalog. Thanks.

1_19y2tY5XJRD3YqFYn9vVgsq74nWBTPUcgv.body:
I know it's hard but stop getting so high and seed your site, I'm getting No Peers

If you visit your site on a ZeroProxy it will help seed it.
http://127.0.0.1:43110/14y3fN1A214HYdKe5f6WnQdfT3PdKLSAJo

1_16bxMyoL49mWYhcZKBYVBT5zEFW9SQpiao.body: Latest Change: Enhanced with alphabetized search results & cleaner site descriptions. Also implemented Kaffiene's improved search code.

Latest Change: 
The search now support an "AND" modifiers. This will allow users to search for entries for multiple terms instead of the default OR function. Searching without the 'and' keyword will continue to treat the terms as an OR check.

Here's an example, preforming a search of:

tv and mp3

will only display results that have the keywords TV and MP3 in the site description,  Enjoy!
- Now has a Bypass Censorship page that gives 15 ways to bypass website censorship.

Reprocessed the entire index, found & removed about 30 dead links of sites that have died over time.  
Added over 600 new reportedly blocked sites to the index, bringing the total to 1043

Index maintenance  
added a filter that should help prevent addresses of domain squatters from being approved for indexing, this is done by ensuring that the title is unique

list now contains some porn and online gambling sites thanks to India.

1_1AgrNBRvnBPhN798PonQKZ7Bgznb9xswM7.body:
For the sake of preventing an empty post,
Kaffiene Discussion can be found here: http://127.0.0.1:43110/0list.bit/?Topic:2_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh/Kaffiene+Search+Engine

1_16Szsy1UtjiXpEevWVdUDrNfNTAZ9PLbcY.body: NullPaste desperately needs a search, category, and expire features.

1_19z3VucxwAoyQZwhmjEgA6vJ9TTp2GmGLN.body:
I know kaffie doesn't like the search indexes being copied, but it would be nice to have Bwoi more populated with links. Feelings of copying be damned.

Right now is the time for development, and having someone copy your code should make someone feel good. (you're doing something right and inspiring) Especially when it comes to providing an abundance of content for the masses, which is the most important part of it all.

All we can do is critique the sites in their own way. Categories, ranking, keywords, description, can even implement a star "ranking" system.

It's not about how many sites we have indexed, it's about what we do with it and how it's provided to the visitors.
I really like Bwoi's UI but I <3 Kaffie's search index. Competition is good, it promotes creativity. ZeroSearch is just an eye sore (imo).

I say thank goodness for Kaffiene search, Bwoi and the link.

> [bwoi](#comment_7_1F1kDrT693w8ATbcXV1wHmGSD6SpSY4f5L): I could add an option to use different indexes if that's what people want, for instance a dropdown box with "Bwoi", "Kaffiene" and "ZeroSearch" selections which will change the index URL.

That would be really really cool and bring back loads of functionality.
This is only the beginning, just wait until someone pushes out the first zite crawler and places it into a local database that gets updated 24 hrs or so.

1_17BcWhPHRH2iFqbPbji7jbzLCTsUSy7AFH.body:
It can be difficult to get visitors to come to your site and be a seeder once it is created.

If you ever have problems with seeding, I found it helps to load the site in one of the many proxies(1) and you can even add your site to the autoseed script(2)  

(1) ZeroProxies : http://127.0.0.1:43110/zeroproxies.bit/  
(2) NewZeronetSites : http://127.0.0.1:43110/1LtvsjbtQ2tY7SCtCZzC4KhErqEK3bXD4n/  

But your site is working and I'm seeding it just fine.
